text: Kafiluddin is a Bangladesh Awami League politician and the former Member of Parliament of Chittagong-9. ==Career== Kafiluddin was elected to parliament from Chittagong-9 as a Bangladesh Awami League candidate in 1973. ==References== Category:Awami League politicians Category:Living people Category:1st Jatiya Sangsad members Category:People from Chittagong District Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Kafiluddin
